pullRequest.title: Ignore BigDecimal and BigInteger reflection hierarchy warnings
pullRequest.bodyText:
These classes are never part of the Jandex index so there
is no point in warning about them.
Fixes: #9189

nodes.bodyText: Please do that in a separate commit next time. It makes the review far harder than it needs to be.
